website_summaries.verdict: Very good power and an external antenna that is ridiculously easy to set up and use.
pros: One of the easiest to set up external antennas out there -- omnidirectional and "finds" signals easily
cons: Another external antenna, but at least it's easy to install and set up to "find" cell signals

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I had a metal roof installed and it killed my phone reception. This fixed the problem! Works well. Be sure to buy the amp that broadcasts in your provider's frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydawg

customer_reviews.title: This booster really works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this booster and it works awesome if you have the right band this thing is perfect. My garage is a steal building you get no reception in there 0 bars. I’m 10 miles from the nearest cell tower. I put the antenna at the peak of my garage about 16ft hooked every thing up and no problem 4 bars this thing works great. I posted 3 pic the first one is in the garage with no service, the second is standing outside with 2 bars and the third is inside the garage with the booster on with 4 bars. If you have the correct band width and want to boost your signal I would buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: YOOPER144

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money on this company.
customer_reviews.text: My handy man has installed 100s if signal boosters this year alone. After working on installing this one from 8am to 7pm & everything was installed correctly, it still didn’t work, he contacted customer service & they confirmed through pictures & verbal explanation that it was done correctly. They said they would have a return consultant contact us with in 4 days. Well... it’s been 4 months & several calls & messages & still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: RV no luck
customer_reviews.text: I helped a friend install one on a metal building apartment. Great results so I bought one for my RV. We generally get low signal at Florida RV parks. Installed antenna on my rear ladder, mounted inside white box 32 ft away in cab overhang. When I turn it in my one bar drops to “no service”.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy, we live rural and get no to little cell service. We can really only use our phones off wifi from our satellite internet. Once this was installed and started up we had full bars and 4G on our metro pcs service. It works great, we will probably add 1 more booster to other side of house for full coverage (lots of cedar trees on property!) Highly recommend and very excited to rid of poor internet service and save $100 a month!
customer_reviews.author: sharki

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until ATT forced me to quit using it.
customer_reviews.text: Went from 1 bar to 3-4 bars until ATT regional engineering showed up at my house claiming that the antenna was causing back-feed and interfering with everyone else’s service in my was affected even though (1) i am in a rural area and (2) MY service was great. The engineer threatened me with a $10,000 fine if i didn’t turn it off and leave it off. Now i have a $200 paper weight. :(
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: The booster works great
customer_reviews.text: We installed the booster and instantly went form 1 bar and no internet to 2 or 4 and the ability to browse and stream video. This is well worth the investment. The reason for 4 stars rather than 5 is the antenna is very sensitive to location. Would buy again if needed. Thanks, Ben
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Reception in Costa Rica mountains
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this booster for my vacation home in Costa Rica. Because I am in the rain forest and surrounded by mountains, My cell phone reception was one bar in one room and no reception in the other rooms. Immediately after installation, my iPhone and iPad reception increased to 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Had no service at all inside my house, now I have four bars!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. The instructions say to put it 4.5 feet above your roof and all this stuff. I completely ignored all that and just hung the antenna from my porch roof. I didn't try to find the best direction to face the antenna or any of that. I didn't have any signal at all inside my house but now I have four bars in every room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WILDBOT3D

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in order to replicate the outside 3G signal in the house. Installed the device as per the instructions and powered it on. There was no change in the 3G reception inside the house. Am exactly where the antena is placed outside and get full bars.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: After a little finagling to get the antenna high enough and pointed towards the cell tower I was able to get a cell signal in my storm shelter. Couldn’t be happier and the follow up customer service is excellent. I’m not a tech person but this works for my purposes and the price was great. It allows me the security of knowing I can call out in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: droughtsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this to work with my phone. I have no idea if it is a problem with the repeater or my phone. Could not identify a location for the nearest cell tower, so I had to just set it up and try every direction. No joy. I get 1 bar on my TracPone CDMA phone (Verizon network) and none of the apps that are supposed to show tower locations would work. Never got any improvement so I really don't know. I live in a rural area, so expected this to help at least a little. It took me too long to test it so I lost the return window. Chalk it up to experience.
customer_reviews.author: Crow Patrol

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems in my basement with receiving a cell phone signal so I took a shot with this cellular amplifier. it took me about 10 minutes to hook it up and by the time I ran the antenna to the outside of my house I already had a 4G signal. This thing is definitely a game-changer and will be great not to have to go upstairs to text or make a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Wissman

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It worked app 1st After a while no difference in cell reception New phone new service provider And this does not work anymore waste of money would not recommend buying its a joke save your $200
customer_reviews.author: kevin sander

customer_reviews.title: Poor signal range and data rate.
customer_reviews.text: Range of this unit it quite poor. Literally had to touch antenna to cell phone to get reasonable data connection, and it was very unstable. After several minutes data signal reduced from 6mbps to 0.5 mbps download. Upload never exceeded 0.1mbps . Unusable data rate.
customer_reviews.author: Tom woolston

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I live outside of the city so my coverage tends to be spotty hence the reason why I took a chance on this signal booster. On my way to work I talk to my spouse and sometimes my call would go silent and try to reconnect. While using this booster it just plainly dropped the call. I can only write from my experiences. I gave it a week and I had no improvements.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO SOSA

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for 4-5 bars
customer_reviews.text: i clamped on tv antenna about 20 feet above ground, but I believe 10-15 feet elevation would work, depending on your terrain. (I got up on a ladder to test that issue.) I oriented the elements vertically, because it was easier to clamp. Works fine - changed a 1 bar signal that cut out often into a 4-5 bar cell signal. Oh, and I put the in-house relay box in the basement, because that was easiest place to bring the coax antenna lead in. The sender box is thus right below my bedroom where I generally use the cell phone. I put the sender box on a piece of aluminum foil to act as a ground plane.
customer_reviews.author: Manthano

customer_reviews.title: Still no service
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use, metro by TMobile will not let onsite to put in none metro TMobile products. Metro TMobile never use them, especially in country never any call service , unless 5 G you are able to make phone calls on could care less about 1,2,3,4,5 G only use Wi-Fi and metro doesn't have but TMobile due.
customer_reviews.author: jlew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad. This was working so well at first. After having it only 1 month (almost to the day) it seems to have stopped working. I have tried everything. The lights are still green but it's not working the same anymore. I just emailed tech support and am hopeful that they will be able to assist me in fixing the issue. I would love to be able to come back and increase my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: There is decent signal on the outside of my building but terrible or no service inside. This booster did the trick. Light weight and easy to setup. (Used with Verizon)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install. Works good. The magnetic antenna is the most surprising thing about this purchase. It was not even a quarter as flimsy as I thought it would be. It's still not the best antenna, but it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Queal

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well in our semi-rural area
customer_reviews.text: I live outside OKC but not so far out that I have lots of dropped calls...except at my house. I'm between towers and don't have good coverage with any carrier. I had another booster that worked well with USCellular but 1 nearby lightning strike knocked it out along with other electronics. I need one that works well with att and usc but not willing to pay big bucks. Guess I'm the loser.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it when we moved out into the country tested it out in my house in the city did not work at all in the city. Got to the new house I had 1 bar no LTE no internet hooked this up got it pointed in the right direction now my phone has full bars and 3g believe we can get LTE once we move it to the other side of the house were it's closer to tower. Over all happy with it I would buy again. If something happens to it will update post. Only had 28 days as of this review.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia

customer_reviews.title: It’s working for me!
customer_reviews.text: This probably the first time I have ever left a product review, but I am pretty excited. Just got this in today. Took 15 minutes to install. Cost around $100 for the booster and an extra 30’ cable. I talked on my phone IN MY LIVING ROOM for the first time in 2 years(and actually all through my house and in the basement). I may be jumping the gun here but no more having to go outside to call someone. I hope it lasts. All you folks with sorry service, this may be a cheaper but great solution for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Sells

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful service and product
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the blue one and it wasn’t the proper one. Free of charge they sent me a more compatible box to try out. Great quality products & customer service. 10/10 recommended THANK YOU PHONETONE
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: This cell signal booster really works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchasing this cell signal booster I was skeptical. But after the simple installation of the antenna and hooking up the cable to the power unit my wife’s AT&T cell phone signal went from one bar to five bars. This is a great alternative if you live in an area where your cell phone service signal is minimal. Great little unit and I would recommend it to everyone who suffers from dropped calls and lack of cell phone service signal.
customer_reviews.author: Joan West

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great quality repeater!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Works as you would expect, only complaint is the power connection is finicky. Sometime you have to play with the connection bit.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Signal Booster?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on price and other reviews. I was skeptical of the bad reviews and purchased it anyway. I am not sure why the device does not work as advertised but it definitely made me lose signal rather than improve it. I would not purchase this device again.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin B.

customer_reviews.title: maybe i bought the wrong thing but it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: maybe i bought the wrong thing but it didn't work at all for me. Zero bars gained both for Verizon and AT&T
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it. We live in a steel framed house ...
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend it. We live in a steel framed house with a steel roof in a wooded area with a high cliff behind our house. We always had to go outside to talk on the phone. Cell service went from 1 bar to 3 to 4 bars can talk inside the house on our cell phones now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t needed tech, so truly can’t rate it. We raised the bars from 2 to 3 or 4. We are ran the TV, 2 computers, and 3 kindle all at the same time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BelindaE

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product and thought that I would give it a chance. I did my homework and made sure that the phones I had run on the bands specified. We have two cell phones in the home, one that runs off of Verizon and one off the AT&T network. We have experienced a 50 to 75% increase in signal indoors, which is wonderful! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong just verify Band!
customer_reviews.text: It worked as advertised and customer support via email was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have bought in years!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! We live where you have to sit in the pickup with the cell phone booster on in the middle of the parking lot to make or receive any calls. At first I was skeptical that it would even work. We put this on the top of our shop (no aiming required), and plugged in the indoor antenna and instantly went from no bars to 4!!! It is strong enough signal to even stream the internet and Netflix! I have and will continue to recommend this to everyone I know with cell service issues! Thanks Phonetone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says!
customer_reviews.text: If you read before buying and check the network band there is no proplems. The day I brought it to my house I just put it right above my front door and pluged it all in the boost worked great my room finally had service. As well it boosted my brother who is on another provider.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Works great .
customer_reviews.text: Works ! The trick is download a signal meter app then find a strong signal area out side and that's where you place the outside bit . I can finally use my phone inside .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great use it while at work in the middle of no where while on service calls.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this signal booster we only had one bar on our cell phones, after I installed it our phones now receive five bars! Worth the time to install and the money. I've already recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple.. Delivered on time with excellent results.. I encountered a failure after 30 days of use. Amazon Customer Service was contacted and due to the period of time they were unable to assist. I was asked to contact Phonetone for other assistance. They provided additional troubleshooting steps and ultimately sent a replacement device without any hassle. They have earned a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: john mayberry

customer_reviews.title: The solution to low/no cell phone service.
customer_reviews.text: This cell phone booster works amazing. Had almost no cell phone reception out on our property in the hill country of Texas. Installed this unit in our cabin and Wallah, 5 bars of signal strength. Just like that. Our service provider is AT&T. We are even running the unit off of solar system and it works flawlessly. Extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BriceMaster

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Nice product , great customer service... But didn't work for us in the mountains of Northern Tenn. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: What a difference.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a metal building and had to go outside to make calls. I really didn't expect this thing to work. It gave us fantastic cellphone reception. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Sun

customer_reviews.title: cell company complained
customer_reviews.text: Cell company said this caused signal problems with service in the area, I had to unhook it.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH M BURNETTE

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy another because it works so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for dad. Tried it out 1st to see if it worked. Had to buy another because it works so good.
customer_reviews.author: David Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: works well, but needs a signal meter.
customer_reviews.text: Other models have a flashing light to let you know it has signal or feedback. This one does not, but I had little trouble getting it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Price, Work's Way Better Then I Expected !
customer_reviews.text: Everything You Buy Don't Always Work The Way You Hope It Will. However This Product Works Way Better Then I Expected !!! With Out It I Have No Internet Service At All In My House, I Have To Drive About A Mile Away From My House. Now I Have Full Signal ! I'm Impressed ! Well Worth The Price !!! JC.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCarlVanHaarenJr

customer_reviews.title: cables to short
customer_reviews.text: Read that its important to have a good bit of separation between antennas. Outside comes with 30 ft. Inside 15 by the time you come from roof into house the cable supplied is used up. Inside antenna should come with 30 ft.not 15.
customer_reviews.author: Bill STX

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make much difference
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my brother who lives in east Texas. It really didn’t make much difference in his ability to get cell phone signals where he lives even with mounting above the roof of his house Hopefully, someday they will put a tower closer.
customer_reviews.author: mjzHouston, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made componants
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, I live in a rual area behind a hill 1 bar on cell phone without antenna, same with it, correct frequency and mounted on a pole facing the closest tower wich is 6 miles away. Ended up returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Freund

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Friend lives in the country where signal was very weak under a tin roof. User could not use cellphone inside until I installed this signal booster. Now they get 4 solid signal bars. Life saver! I would highly commend if you have a phone that's approved for this device. Check your carrier first. Works on AT&T but not on my Verizon phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle worker, but a good product.
customer_reviews.text: After installing this on our cabin it improved the signal on our phone and the bars went from one bar to two. We had to once unplug the device and re plug it in to get our device to work again. We've only used the device for a week, We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Toms

customer_reviews.title: no impact on signal strength
customer_reviews.text: No impact on my signal strength in town or in rural areas. Set it up, registered it with my provider and no difference. I do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased for the price
customer_reviews.text: We are in a very rural area and have little reception outside. We had none inside, and on ATT, we have three bars inside now. A lightning storm took out the power supply, but Amazon had a replacement for 9 bucks. Very pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Went from no service and 1 bar to 3 bars continuous or 4 LTE depending on weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product/fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Don't be afraid to buy one. I can now text and call from a large portion of my home. Better than the old zero service! My home has metal in the walls...that is why I needed this repeater system. Be sure you order the correct megahertz for the tower you need to use.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: This did not help at all
customer_reviews.text: We installed it exactly like the directions stated and nothing......
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Salyards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cell booster for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit for my remote cabin which only got one bar at best. Installation was simple and quick. Now I have 5 full bars which is great. Now I can hotspot my phone to the smart t.v. and watch movies from my online accounts. No buffering issues so far. I highly recommend this unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too sure this was going to work as I had signal about a mile from my house and would occasionally get one bar, but could never use the phone. I now have a consistent 3 to 4 bars and 4G. Using a Samsung Galaxy s8 with AT&T. I would definitely buy this again and reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Custer

customer_reviews.title: Great reception
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We live in a pretty remote area. My cell went from unusable in most of the house to near perfect reception. Easy set up/install. You dont even have to put it on the roof. My house has an attic and I just installed it up there to save the hassle of climbing on the roof. Overall very happy with the antenna.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to install. Tremendous tech support, I am completely satisfied. J W (Jerry) Groah
customer_reviews.author: J W Groah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my US cellular service! I went from 1 bar in my basement to full bars 😁
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great had no signal IN House now I do
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Returned Product:  Product description is not adequte
customer_reviews.text: The signal booster requires a 50 ft. coaxial cable from the inside antenna to and an outside antenna that requires mounting to the roof of the house.. I was looking for a plug in device. I was unpleasantly surprised by the E-mail instructions for installation after received the signal booster.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, work's great
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with signal booster,it works great I had 1 bar before installing it how I have 4 bars of signal.And it was easy to install just found signal and installed .I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: ford-man

customer_reviews.title: 1 bar is what you start with that's all you get
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. It may work in a large city but you probably wouldn't need it then. Tried all the tips an instructions. No signal improvement at all. Also is not 850 mhz as listed. Do your homework as I did before buying, but your still taking a chance anyway
customer_reviews.author: Kelly-K

customer_reviews.title: Everything they say it is!
customer_reviews.text: This unit does everything they say. I'm very impressed with it. Thought I would start with the least expensive booster just to give it a try, will not even need to upgrade. Added two bars to our cell signal, went from 1x-3G to full LTE. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great... Brings a strong signal in to the metal warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Cricket Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for cricket wireless, which operates on AT&T
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Birkeland

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Did not boost my signal at all. Took my 1 bar 4g signal to 4 bar 3g. After 5 minutes unit and charger got really hot. Be careful with this unit its a fire hazard. Returned to Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions :)
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit tough to set up, but ended up working out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works well w/ most phones however doesnt seem to work w/ note 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No noticable difference
customer_reviews.text: Installed at the highest point on my house. Tried everything and just don't see any noticeable difference with it on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Almeda

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: very happy good price easy to install works grate have two friends that that perched one also
customer_reviews.author: chas long

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Won't give you service if there's none to be had but if you're suffering loss of service do to a metal roof or building this is the ticket
customer_reviews.author: Matthew david bardin

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in minutes, boost signals on all phones. Wifi Boost Your Hotspot too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Cell Signal Booster
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me, I couldn't get any signal with this booster so returned it.
customer_reviews.author: retho78

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and works fantastic. I went from 1 bar of service in my house to 4 bars.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: It was of no value in my location
customer_reviews.text: It had no effect whatsoever. My guess would be that it requires a stronger tower signal (than what I am receiving) to do any good.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; seems to work in my metal building. I used the recommended app to show the direction to point the antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Not FCC approved
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with Verizon for almost two years and then AT&T showed up at my door. Told to cease and desist.
customer_reviews.author: E Keel

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work AT ALL! I followed the directions exactly paying attention to every detail. I have a 2008 ford F350.
customer_reviews.author: jasonhancock

customer_reviews.title: Keep an eye on the outside antenna
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need the tec support was easy to install the antenna magnets could be stronger I haven't tried it on a long distance trip yet
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This system is beautiful in its simplicity. It is pretty easy to set up as long as you are good working on a ladder with basic hand tools. The hardest part is deciding where to put the three main pieces. Once you get that worked out, there is nothing to it. I don't know why I waited all these years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, I have a 36x60 pole building that had no cell signal when I went inside, now its 4 bars of 4g.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It only extends service to one room in my house. Had my satellite guy install for me and he says his is a different brand but he gets service all over his house. The trouble may be I have a tin roof...
customer_reviews.author: Denise Caracofe

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This item did nothing to bust the signal so it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: e bass

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: In the area we live in very weak 4G signal (1 maybe 2 bars) After installing unit improved to 2,3 and sometimes 4 bars. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Bass

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This booster didn't not improve my service at all you couldn't even tell I had a booster hooked up
customer_reviews.author: vickie lester

customer_reviews.title: Love My Cell Booster
customer_reviews.text: works great and no dropped calls and no that I am working from home because of COVID19 my wifi is working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Liked it.
customer_reviews.text: When it is working, it works great. For some reason, my cell shows 3 bars but is still super slow sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: We use this out our camp and it works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: We got no cell reception in the evening in this house. Now we have full bars!! Just took some time for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price

product_meta.title: Cell Phone Signal Booster for Home and Office - 850MHz Band 5 GSM 3G Cellular Repeater with Directional Panel/Yagi Antennas - Boost Voice, Text Up to 4,500Sq Ft Area
feature_bullets: 【BETTER VOICE AND DATA】 Reduces dropped and missed calls and provides faster 3G data performance for multiple simultaneous users.

【COMPATIBLE WITH MOST NETWORKS】 The booster works on Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, US Cellular, Straight Talk and more, compatible with all mobile phones and devices operating on frequency 850 MHz, band 5.
【LARGEST COVERAGE】Both the directional indoor panel and outdoor yagi antennas with 8-10dBi high gain, the coverage can cover up to 4,500sq ft all over your house if outdoor signal is strong.

【EASY SETUP】All the Mounting Screw Kit needed for the installation are included in the package, you can set up booster and antennas easily with the User Manual Instructions, no technical experience needed.
【PERFORMANCE GUARANTEED】FCC Certified, 30-day money-back guarantee, 3-month free replacement, 1-year manufacturer warranty. Professional technical support: us@phonetone-tech.com.
